items.text: back of a length and snaking in, grazes the pad outside the line and rolls past the keeper
items.shortText: Chameera to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 leg bye

items.text: full and slanting in at off stump, Mushfiq ventures across off and bunts it to the leg side
items.postText: sydee: "Riad and Mushi making it harder for them.They are playing lots of dot deliveries.You have to take singles to transfer some pressure on bowling side"
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: fullish and outside off, Mushfiq presses forward and slices behind point
short on off, cramps the batsman for room, stabbed off the back foot to backward point
short and angling in on middle, Mahmudullah softens his grip and defends to the leg side
items.postText: amila: "Even though lakmal picked up up wickets, what a spell from chameera!!"

items.preText: Lakmal gets some treatment on his right knee. SL can't afford another injury. The seamer is good to resume
items.text: full on the stumps, dribbled back to the bowler
short, hits the bat hard, fended to the off side

items.preText: Thisara comes on. He's in the middle of a hot streak
items.text: short and outside off, chopped to the covers
items.shortText: Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Ravindra Dayara: "Danu impressive on his fielding. Remembering all days with Dilly at covers."
items.text: good length and outside off, no shot
items.shortText: Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back of a length and outside off, rides the bounce and guides it to third man
on a length and outside off, helped to backward point
Mahmudullah breaks the shackles and how. He stays leg-side of the ball, hares down the track, and smokes it to the cover boundary. Dismissive
banged in short on off, chest-high ball, cramps the batsman for room. He flaps a pull in the air to the right of square leg
short and angling into a clip to square leg
back of a length and angling in, blocked to point off the back foot
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: short and angling down leg, deflected off the thigh pad to fine leg
items.shortText: Lakmal to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 leg bye

items.preText: A leg-gully has been installed for Mahmudullah
items.text: Lakmal has bounced out Mahmudullah! There was only one man at the boundary on the leg side and the batsman has picked out Chameera at fine leg. This was a plan: dig it short and attack the body with assistance from leg-gully and fine leg. This chest-hunting ball rushes Mahmudullah into the hook and he holes out. Excellent bowling and excellent fielding to boot from Sri Lanka
items.postText: chathura Udayan: "Danushka has been reckless with the opportunities given to him. it's high time he become a more responsible player with the bat."

dismissal.text: Mahmudullah c Chameera b Lakmal 7 (20b 1x4 0x6) SR: 35.00

items.text: short and outside off, Sabbir ducks out of the way
items.shortText: Lakmal to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: lifting short ball on off, Sabbir rises with it and drops it to backward point
items.postText: Hashir: "The score board reminds me of the good old days when Bangladesh had a domino effect against the Sri Lankan bowling line up.."
items.shortText: Lakmal to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: full and angling into a front-foot bunt to mid-on
items.postText: Ishan Liyanage: "My day started with the U19 world cup match between Afghanistan & NZ. Now watching the T20 between NZ & PAK, while following the commentary of this match on Cricinfo (this game not shown live in Australia). Then there's the BBL match between Perth & Adelaide starting soon followed by the Ind v SA test match. Oh yeah.. I like the game... a little!. " --- Drink it in.... a little
items.shortText: Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: Thisara raps the glove with one that bounces from a back of a length. Mushfiq looks to loosen his grip but cops a blow on the glove
items.shortText: Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full and slanted down the leg side, past the flick
items.postText: savindhu: "that wicket should go under chandimal for giving Lakmal another over and executing a plan"

items.text: overpitched and outside off, Mushfiq lays into it and thrashes a drive to the cover boundary
items.shortText: Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.preText: Chaminda: "This is more like the Sri Lankan team we used to know"
items.text: short and outside off, Mushfiq controls a hook and hits it to deep midwicket
dug in short on off, Sabbir rocks back and takes it to deep midwicket with a firm pull
items.postText: SL keep peppering the Bangladesh batsmen with short balls
